;double digaonal road, straight highway 
;piece 108
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x02040200,0x5F232E00,2,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x04020002,0x5F232E00,3,0
TYPE3=0x03010301,0x02000204,0x5F232E00,0,0
TYPE4=0x01030103,0x00020402,0x5F232E00,1,0
TYPE5=0x01030103,0x02000204,0x5F232E00,2,1
TYPE6=0x03010301,0x00020402,0x5F232E00,1,1
TYPE7=0x01030103,0x02040200,0x5F232E00,0,1
TYPE8=0x03010301,0x04020002,0x5F232E00,3,1
;
;Added 060905 ~ Tropod
;a number of these junctions contain unfixable pathing issues. not all of them contain pathing issues though. depend on the rotation, i.e. which way the paths are going in conjunction with one another.
;Paths are not working properly like they should be ~ faulty path routing to blame.
;orthogonal Road + Intersection,diagonal highway overhead
;case 1
TYPE1=0x02020202,0x03010301,0x5F071000,0,0
TYPE2=0x02020202,0x01030103,0x5F071000,1,0
;case 2
TYPE1=0x02020202,0x03010000,0x5F071200,0,0
TYPE2=0x02020202,0x00000301,0x5F071200,2,0
TYPE3=0x02020202,0x00030100,0x5F071200,3,0
TYPE4=0x02020202,0x01000003,0x5F071200,1,0
;orthogonal Road T Intersection,diagonal highway overhead
; 1a
TYPE1=0x02020200,0x03010301,0x5F071100,0,0
TYPE2=0x02020002,0x01030103,0x5F071100,1,0
TYPE3=0x02000202,0x03010301,0x5F071100,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020202,0x01030103,0x5F071100,3,0
; 1b
TYPE1=0x02020200,0x01030103,0x5F071100,2,1
TYPE2=0x02020002,0x03010301,0x5F071100,1,1
TYPE3=0x02000202,0x01030103,0x5F071100,0,1
TYPE4=0x00020202,0x03010301,0x5F071100,3,1
; 2a
TYPE1=0x02020200,0x03010000,0x5F071300,0,0

TYPE3=0x02000202,0x00000301,0x5F071300,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020202,0x00030100,0x5F071300,3,0
